post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Title: Java Developer
Posted On: 3/17/2010 10:53:30 AM
Designation: Java Developer
Number of Vacancies: 1
Qualifications: Bachelor degree in Computer Science
Essential Skills:
Java - 2 yrs.
Minimum Experience: 2 yrs.
Job Tenure: Full-time Only
Salary Offered: Not specified
Job Location: Toronto, ON, Canada
Job Description
Knowledge and Skills Required:
· Bachelor degree in Computer Science or related discipline or an equivalent combination of education and experience from which comparable knowledge and skills may be acquired.
· 2-3 years of technical experience in design, development, testing and deployment of software using Java, Servlets, JSP, JDBC, RMI
· Effective oral and written communication skills
· Must be able to work independently and in a team
· Display good time management skills and work in a deadline environment.
· Experience with Unix, Linux shell scripting and/or Perl scripting
· Solid experience using a Relational Database Management System preferably Sybase ASE 12), in database modeling and with SQL-92 or equivalent.
· Experience in web developemnt Java Script, HTML, XML.
· Good problem solving skills.


Pass on to your friends too and check out www.iitjobs.com

# This position is for Toronto, ON, United States.

Company Details
Name: JumpPoint Technologies Inc.
Type: Consulting Organization
Total Employees: Not specified
Turnover: Not specified
Address:
Commerce Gardens,
30 Wertheim Court, #13,
Richmond Hill,
Ontario,
Canada
Profile:
JumpPoint Technologies specializes in creating customized service solutions to better identify and satisfy your company's unique IT needs. We offer services such as buying and leasing personal and mid-range computers along with providing networking equipment from many of the most trusted names in the Information Technology industry - names like IBM, Cisco, HP/Compaq and Sun Microsystems.
post.title: Java Developer -2 years EXP
